radiographic_examinations.findings: Left-sided abdominal mass (8.5 x 5.5 x 3.5 cm) with local lymph node metastasis.
Lytic lesions within the lumbar vertebra 2.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of metastatic PGL was noted clinically and biochemically one year later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased uptake in the proximal right femur and in the frontal skull.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Metastatic PGL progression was noted one year later.
